title: Woman Wanted For Murder Of Disabled Son, 6, Believed He Was "Evil, Demon"
content: Cindy Rodriguez Singh, a woman with ties to India, is wanted for allegedly killing her 6-year-old son Noel, who has been missing since October 2022. The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is offering a reward of up to $25,000 for her arrest.
summary: Cindy Rodriguez Singh, a woman with ties to India, is wanted for allegedly killing her 6-year-old son Noel, who has been missing since October 2022. The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is offering a reward of up to $25,000 for her arrest.

title: "Era Of Uninterrupted Dialogue Over...": S Jaishankar's Big Statement On Pak
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar has signalled a distinct change in the government's Pakistan policy, stating "the era of uninterrupted dialogue... is over" but stressing New Delhi stands ready to react to developments "positive or negative".
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar has signalled a distinct change in the government's Pakistan policy, stating "the era of uninterrupted dialogue... is over" but stressing New Delhi stands ready to react to developments "positive or negative".

title: New Zealand's Maori King Dies After 18-Year Reign, World Leaders Mourn
content: The king of New Zealand's Maori died on Friday after heart surgery, with aides saying the beloved 69-year-old monarch, praised as a symbol of national unity, had "passed to the great beyond".
summary: The king of New Zealand's Maori died on Friday after heart surgery, with aides saying the beloved 69-year-old monarch, praised as a symbol of national unity, had "passed to the great beyond".

title: S Jaishankar's Assurance As Indian Girl Taken Away From Parents In Germany
content: Foreign Ministry is making efforts to push for an early return of a three-and-a-half-year-old girl from Thane, who has been in foster care in Germany for the last 36 months following allegations of minor physical abuse, local MP Naresh Mhaske said.
summary: Foreign Ministry is making efforts to push for an early return of a three-and-a-half-year-old girl from Thane, who has been in foster care in Germany for the last 36 months following allegations of minor physical abuse, local MP Naresh Mhaske said.

title: Long Awaited Game "Star Wars Outlaws" Released After 4 Years
content: After more than four years in the making, French video game designer Ubisoft on Friday released its much-anticipated "Star Wars Outlaws", an immersive spinoff from the famed saga.
summary: After more than four years in the making, French video game designer Ubisoft on Friday released its much-anticipated "Star Wars Outlaws", an immersive spinoff from the famed saga.

title: Australian Census To Ask Citizens Their Sexuality After LGBTQ Backlash
content: Australia's census will ask citizens about their sexuality for the first time, the government said Friday, a policy U-turn aimed at quelling anger from LGBTQ groups.
summary: Australia's census will ask citizens about their sexuality for the first time, the government said Friday, a policy U-turn aimed at quelling anger from LGBTQ groups.

title: Ukraine Pilot Killed In F-16 Jet Crash While Fighting Russian Airstrikes
content: The General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has confirmed that an F16 fighter jet crashed and its pilot died while combating Russian airstrikes.
summary: The General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has confirmed that an F16 fighter jet crashed and its pilot died while combating Russian airstrikes.

title: Like Humans, These Animals Give Each Other Names
content: Naming others is considered a marker of highly advanced cognition in social animals, previously observed only in humans, bottlenose dolphins and African elephants. Marmoset monkeys have now joined this exclusive club, according to a new study.
summary: Naming others is considered a marker of highly advanced cognition in social animals, previously observed only in humans, bottlenose dolphins and African elephants. Marmoset monkeys have now joined this exclusive club, according to a new study.

title: Nvidia Discusses Joining OpenAI's Latest Funding Round
content: Apple Inc. and Microsoft Corp. also have been in talks about participating in the financing that is led by Thrive Capital, which is investing about $1 billion
summary: Apple Inc. and Microsoft Corp. also have been in talks about participating in the financing that is led by Thrive Capital, which is investing about $1 billion

title: Viral Pics Show Resumes Of Steve Jobs, Bill Gates When They Were 18
content: Resumes of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs and Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, two of the most iconic figures in the world of technology, have resurfaced on social media.
summary: Resumes of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs and Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, two of the most iconic figures in the world of technology, have resurfaced on social media.

title: A Staggering $150 Million Insurance Payout For Superyacht That Sank
content: Insurers of the Bayesian superyacht that sank this month, killing tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and six others, could be on the hook for at least $150 million, according to the first estimates by industry experts.
summary: Insurers of the Bayesian superyacht that sank this month, killing tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and six others, could be on the hook for at least $150 million, according to the first estimates by industry experts.

title: Abortion At Home Via Pills Safe Till 12 Weeks Of Pregnancy: Lancet Study
content: Managing abortion at home using pills is safe and may ease hospital burden, claimed a study published in The Lancet journal on Friday.
summary: Managing abortion at home using pills is safe and may ease hospital burden, claimed a study published in The Lancet journal on Friday.

title: AI Chatbot Startup Lays Off At Least 5% Of Its Staff: Report
content: Chatbot startup Character.AI laid off at least 5% of its staff, The Information reported on Thursday, citing a person briefed by company leaders.
summary: Chatbot startup Character.AI laid off at least 5% of its staff, The Information reported on Thursday, citing a person briefed by company leaders.

title: What Is West Nile Infection. Symptoms And Treatment
content: The condition of a Missouri teen, who contracted the West Nile virus just over two weeks ago, has left many concerned in the United States.
summary: The condition of a Missouri teen, who contracted the West Nile virus just over two weeks ago, has left many concerned in the United States.

title: Outcry In China After Women Lock Crying Child In Plane Toilet
content: Two women in China have been accused of child abuse after they separated a crying child from her grandmother and locked her in the toilet of a plane to "educate her".
summary: Two women in China have been accused of child abuse after they separated a crying child from her grandmother and locked her in the toilet of a plane to "educate her".

title: US Teen, Who Just Graduated, Paralysed Due To Rare West Nile Infection
content: An 18-year-old Missouri teen has been fighting for his life in a hospital for two weeks after contracting the West Nile virus.
summary: An 18-year-old Missouri teen has been fighting for his life in a hospital for two weeks after contracting the West Nile virus.

title: Kamala Harris Vows To Be Tough On Migration, Supports Weapons For Israel
content: Kamala Harris vowed a tougher approach to migration along the U.S. southern border and said she would not withhold weapons to Israel, in her first interview with a major news organization since becoming the Democratic nominee for president.
summary: Kamala Harris vowed a tougher approach to migration along the U.S. southern border and said she would not withhold weapons to Israel, in her first interview with a major news organization since becoming the Democratic nominee for president.

title: US Army Hits Out At Trump's Staff Over Pushing Military Cemetery Worker
content: The US Army on Thursday took aim at Donald Trump's staff over a visit by the Republican presidential candidate to the country's most hallowed resting place for its war dead.
summary: The US Army on Thursday took aim at Donald Trump's staff over a visit by the Republican presidential candidate to the country's most hallowed resting place for its war dead.

title: US Man Executed For Killing College Student, Raping His Sister In 1995
content: A man convicted of murdering a college student and raping his sister while the siblings were on a camping trip was executed in the southern US state of Florida on Thursday, prison officials said.
summary: A man convicted of murdering a college student and raping his sister while the siblings were on a camping trip was executed in the southern US state of Florida on Thursday, prison officials said.

title: Kamala Harris Rejects "Flip-Flop" Claims: "My Values Have Not Changed"
content: Kamala Harris defended her policy shifts on key issues Thursday, insisting in the first interview of her US presidential campaign that her "values have not changed."
summary: Kamala Harris defended her policy shifts on key issues Thursday, insisting in the first interview of her US presidential campaign that her "values have not changed."
